title: Correction to: Morpho-physiological and yield traits for selection of drought tolerant Urochloa grass ecotypes
content: This is a correction to: Celestine Anyango Ochola, Mathew Pierro Ngugi, Evans N Nyaboga, Donald M G Njarui, Morpho-physiological and yield traits for selection of drought tolerant Urochloa grass ecotypes, AoB PLANTS, Volume 16, Issue 3, June 2024, plae034, https://doi.org/10.1093/aobpla/plae034
